fields.Title: Interlocutoring blog
fields.Description/Abstract:
<p>Interlocutoring is a blog dedicated to exploring everyday innovation in higher education. Interlocutoring’s mission is to inspire and inform educators, students, and administrators about the latest trends, best practices, and creative ideas that are shaping the future of learning.</p>
<p>Interlocutoring is rooted in the belief that innovation is not just about groundbreaking technologies or revolutionary concepts; it's about the small, everyday changes that can make a big difference in the classroom and beyond. From teaching methods and campus culture to technology and administration, Interlocutoring covers a wide range of topics that are relevant to the higher education community, highlighting where and how small changes can make a big difference.</p>
